name: Human Shadows
description:
Alex just dropped out of college and got a new job at an insane asylum to try and make a few extra bucks, but soon he starts to realize there's something wrong going on under the hoods.

Explore the institution and dive deep into the story inspired by real facts set in 1970's Brazil, that discusses anti-asylum laws in the modern days.

.

We are game design students from Brazil and this project started as a semester assignment. We would love to hear your feedback in the comments <3
